text: The burden [strongs id="h4853" /] of Nineveh [strongs id="h5210" /]. The book [strongs id="h5612" /] of the vision [strongs id="h2377" /] of Nahum [strongs id="h5151" /] the Elkoshite [strongs id="h512" /].

God [strongs id="h410" /] [is] jealous [strongs id="h7072" /], and the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] revengeth [strongs id="h5358" tvm="8802" /]; the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] revengeth [strongs id="h5358" tvm="8802" /], and [is] furious [strongs id="h1167" /] [strongs id="h2534" /]; the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] will take vengeance [strongs id="h5358" tvm="8802" /] on his adversaries [strongs id="h6862" /], and he reserveth [strongs id="h5201" tvm="8802" /] [wrath] for his enemies [strongs id="h341" tvm="8802" /].

The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [is] slow [strongs id="h750" /] to anger [strongs id="h639" /], and great [strongs id="h1419" /] in power [strongs id="h3581" /], and will not at all [strongs id="h5352" tvm="8763" /] acquit [strongs id="h5352" tvm="8762" /] [the wicked]: the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath his way [strongs id="h1870" /] in the whirlwind [strongs id="h5492" /] and in the storm [strongs id="h8183" /], and the clouds [strongs id="h6051" /] [are] the dust [strongs id="h80" /] of his feet [strongs id="h7272" /].

He rebuketh [strongs id="h1605" tvm="8802" /] the sea [strongs id="h3220" /], and maketh it dry [strongs id="h2717" tvm="8689" /], and drieth up [strongs id="h3001" tvm="8762" /] all the rivers [strongs id="h5104" /]: Bashan [strongs id="h1316" /] languisheth [strongs id="h535" tvm="8797" /], and Carmel [strongs id="h3760" /], and the flower [strongs id="h6525" /] of Lebanon [strongs id="h3844" /] languisheth [strongs id="h535" tvm="8797" /].

The mountains [strongs id="h2022" /] quake [strongs id="h7493" tvm="8804" /] at him, and the hills [strongs id="h1389" /] melt [strongs id="h4127" tvm="8712" /], and the earth [strongs id="h776" /] is burned [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] at his presence [strongs id="h6440" /], yea, the world [strongs id="h8398" /], and all that dwell [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] therein.

Who can stand [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8799" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] his indignation [strongs id="h2195" /]? and who can abide [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8799" /] in the fierceness [strongs id="h2740" /] of his anger [strongs id="h639" /]? his fury [strongs id="h2534" /] is poured out [strongs id="h5413" tvm="8738" /] like fire [strongs id="h784" /], and the rocks [strongs id="h6697" /] are thrown down [strongs id="h5422" tvm="8738" /] by him.

The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [is] good [strongs id="h2896" /], a strong hold [strongs id="h4581" /] in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of trouble [strongs id="h6869" /]; and he knoweth [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8802" /] them that trust [strongs id="h2620" tvm="8802" /] in him.

But with an overrunning [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8802" /] flood [strongs id="h7858" /] he will make [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /] an utter end [strongs id="h3617" /] of the place [strongs id="h4725" /] thereof, and darkness [strongs id="h2822" /] shall pursue [strongs id="h7291" tvm="8762" /] his enemies [strongs id="h341" tvm="8802" /].

What do ye imagine [strongs id="h2803" tvm="8762" /] against the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]? he will make [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8802" /] an utter end [strongs id="h3617" /]: affliction [strongs id="h6869" /] shall not rise up [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8799" /] the second time [strongs id="h6471" /].

For while [they be] folden together [strongs id="h5440" tvm="8803" /] [as] thorns [strongs id="h5518" /], and while they are drunken [strongs id="h5433" tvm="8803" /] [as] drunkards [strongs id="h5435" /], they shall be devoured [strongs id="h398" tvm="8795" /] as stubble [strongs id="h7179" /] fully [strongs id="h4392" /] dry [strongs id="h3002" /].

There is [one] come out [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8804" /] of thee, that imagineth [strongs id="h2803" tvm="8802" /] evil [strongs id="h7451" /] against the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], a wicked [strongs id="h1100" /] counsellor [strongs id="h3289" tvm="8802" /].

Thus saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; Though [they be] quiet [strongs id="h8003" /], and likewise many [strongs id="h7227" /], yet thus shall they be cut down [strongs id="h1494" tvm="8738" /], when he shall pass through [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8804" /]. Though I have afflicted [strongs id="h6031" tvm="8765" /] thee, I will afflict [strongs id="h6031" tvm="8762" /] thee no more.

For now will I break [strongs id="h7665" tvm="8799" /] his yoke [strongs id="h4132" /] from off thee, and will burst [strongs id="h5423" /] thy bonds [strongs id="h4147" /] in sunder [strongs id="h5423" tvm="8762" /].

And the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath given a commandment [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8765" /] concerning thee, [that] no more of thy name [strongs id="h8034" /] be sown [strongs id="h2232" tvm="8735" /]: out of the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of thy gods [strongs id="h430" /] will I cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8686" /] the graven image [strongs id="h6459" /] and the molten image [strongs id="h4541" /]: I will make [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8799" /] thy grave [strongs id="h6913" /]; for thou art vile [strongs id="h7043" tvm="8804" /].

Behold upon the mountains [strongs id="h2022" /] the feet [strongs id="h7272" /] of him that bringeth good tidings [strongs id="h1319" tvm="8764" /], that publisheth [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8688" /] peace [strongs id="h7965" /]! O Judah [strongs id="h3063" /], keep [strongs id="h2287" tvm="8798" /] thy solemn feasts [strongs id="h2282" /], perform [strongs id="h7999" tvm="8761" /] thy vows [strongs id="h5088" /]: for the wicked [strongs id="h1100" /] shall no more [strongs id="h3254" tvm="8686" /] pass through [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8800" /] thee; he is utterly cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8738" /].

He that dasheth in pieces [strongs id="h6327" tvm="8688" /] is come up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8804" /] before thy face [strongs id="h6440" /]: keep [strongs id="h5341" tvm="8800" /] the munition [strongs id="h4694" /], watch [strongs id="h6822" tvm="8761" /] the way [strongs id="h1870" /], make [thy] loins [strongs id="h4975" /] strong [strongs id="h2388" tvm="8761" /], fortify [strongs id="h553" tvm="8761" /] [thy] power [strongs id="h3581" /] mightily [strongs id="h3966" /].

For the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath turned away [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8804" /] the excellency [strongs id="h1347" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /], as the excellency [strongs id="h1347" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /]: for the emptiers [strongs id="h1238" tvm="8802" /] have emptied them out [strongs id="h1238" tvm="8804" /], and marred [strongs id="h7843" tvm="8765" /] their vine branches [strongs id="h2156" /].

The shield [strongs id="h4043" /] of his mighty men [strongs id="h1368" /] is made red [strongs id="h119" tvm="8794" /], the valiant [strongs id="h2428" /] men [strongs id="h582" /] [are] in scarlet [strongs id="h8529" tvm="8794" /]: the chariots [strongs id="h7393" /] [shall be] with flaming [strongs id="h784" /] torches [strongs id="h6393" /] in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of his preparation [strongs id="h3559" tvm="8687" /], and the fir trees [strongs id="h1265" /] shall be terribly shaken [strongs id="h7477" tvm="8717" /].

The chariots [strongs id="h7393" /] shall rage [strongs id="h1984" tvm="8704" /] in the streets [strongs id="h2351" /], they shall justle one against another [strongs id="h8264" tvm="8698" /] in the broad ways [strongs id="h7339" /]: they shall seem [strongs id="h4758" /] like torches [strongs id="h3940" /], they shall run [strongs id="h7323" tvm="8787" /] like the lightnings [strongs id="h1300" /].

He shall recount [strongs id="h2142" tvm="8799" /] his worthies [strongs id="h117" /]: they shall stumble [strongs id="h3782" tvm="8735" /] in their walk [strongs id="h1979" /]; they shall make haste [strongs id="h4116" tvm="8762" /] to the wall [strongs id="h2346" /] thereof, and the defence [strongs id="h5526" tvm="8802" /] shall be prepared [strongs id="h3559" tvm="8717" /].

The gates [strongs id="h8179" /] of the rivers [strongs id="h5104" /] shall be opened [strongs id="h6605" tvm="8738" /], and the palace [strongs id="h1964" /] shall be dissolved [strongs id="h4127" tvm="8738" /].

And Huzzab [strongs id="h5324" tvm="8717" /] shall be led away captive [strongs id="h1540" tvm="8795" /], she shall be brought up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8717" /], and her maids [strongs id="h519" /] shall lead [strongs id="h5090" tvm="8764" /] [her] as with the voice [strongs id="h6963" /] of doves [strongs id="h3123" /], tabering [strongs id="h8608" tvm="8781" /] upon their breasts [strongs id="h3824" /].

But Nineveh [strongs id="h5210" /] [is] of old [strongs id="h3117" /] like a pool [strongs id="h1295" /] of water [strongs id="h4325" /]: yet they shall flee away [strongs id="h5127" tvm="8801" /]. Stand [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8798" /], stand [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8798" /], [shall they cry]; but none shall look back [strongs id="h6437" tvm="8688" /].

Take ye the spoil [strongs id="h962" tvm="8798" /] of silver [strongs id="h3701" /], take the spoil [strongs id="h962" tvm="8798" /] of gold [strongs id="h2091" /]: for [there is] none end [strongs id="h7097" /] of the store [strongs id="h8498" /] [and] glory [strongs id="h3519" /] out of all the pleasant [strongs id="h2532" /] furniture [strongs id="h3627" /].

She is empty [strongs id="h950" /], and void [strongs id="h4003" /], and waste [strongs id="h1110" tvm="8794" /]: and the heart [strongs id="h3820" /] melteth [strongs id="h4549" tvm="8738" /], and the knees [strongs id="h1290" /] smite together [strongs id="h6375" /], and much pain [strongs id="h2479" /] [is] in all loins [strongs id="h4975" /], and the faces [strongs id="h6440" /] of them all gather [strongs id="h6908" tvm="8765" /] blackness [strongs id="h6289" /].

Where [is] the dwelling [strongs id="h4583" /] of the lions [strongs id="h738" /], and the feedingplace [strongs id="h4829" /] of the young lions [strongs id="h3715" /], where the lion [strongs id="h738" /], [even] the old lion [strongs id="h3833" /], walked [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /], [and] the lionâ€™s [strongs id="h738" /] whelp [strongs id="h1482" /], and none made [them] afraid [strongs id="h2729" tvm="8688" /]?

The lion [strongs id="h738" /] did tear in pieces [strongs id="h2963" tvm="8802" /] enough [strongs id="h1767" /] for his whelps [strongs id="h1484" /], and strangled [strongs id="h2614" tvm="8764" /] for his lionesses [strongs id="h3833" /], and filled [strongs id="h4390" tvm="8762" /] his holes [strongs id="h2356" /] with prey [strongs id="h2964" /], and his dens [strongs id="h4585" /] with ravin [strongs id="h2966" /].

Behold, I [am] against thee, saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /], and I will burn [strongs id="h1197" tvm="8689" /] her chariots [strongs id="h7393" /] in the smoke [strongs id="h6227" /], and the sword [strongs id="h2719" /] shall devour [strongs id="h398" tvm="8799" /] thy young lions [strongs id="h3715" /]: and I will cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8689" /] thy prey [strongs id="h2964" /] from the earth [strongs id="h776" /], and the voice [strongs id="h6963" /] of thy messengers [strongs id="h4397" /] shall no more be heard [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8735" /].

Woe [strongs id="h1945" /] to the bloody [strongs id="h1818" /] city [strongs id="h5892" /]! it [is] all full [strongs id="h4392" /] of lies [strongs id="h3585" /] [and] robbery [strongs id="h6563" /]; the prey [strongs id="h2964" /] departeth [strongs id="h4185" tvm="8686" /] not;

The noise [strongs id="h6963" /] of a whip [strongs id="h7752" /], and the noise [strongs id="h6963" /] of the rattling [strongs id="h7494" /] of the wheels [strongs id="h212" /], and of the pransing [strongs id="h1725" tvm="8802" /] horses [strongs id="h5483" /], and of the jumping [strongs id="h7540" tvm="8764" /] chariots [strongs id="h4818" /].

The horseman [strongs id="h6571" /] lifteth up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8688" /] both the bright [strongs id="h3851" /] sword [strongs id="h2719" /] and the glittering [strongs id="h1300" /] spear [strongs id="h2595" /]: and [there is] a multitude [strongs id="h7230" /] of slain [strongs id="h2491" /], and a great [strongs id="h3514" /] number of carcases [strongs id="h6297" /]; and [there is] none end [strongs id="h7097" /] of [their] corpses [strongs id="h1472" /]; they stumble [strongs id="h3782" tvm="8804" tvm2="8675" /] [strongs id="h3782" tvm="8735" /] upon their corpses [strongs id="h1472" /]:

Because of the multitude [strongs id="h7230" /] of the whoredoms [strongs id="h2183" /] of the wellfavoured [strongs id="h2896" /] [strongs id="h2580" /] harlot [strongs id="h2181" tvm="8802" /], the mistress [strongs id="h1172" /] of witchcrafts [strongs id="h3785" /], that selleth [strongs id="h4376" tvm="8802" /] nations [strongs id="h1471" /] through her whoredoms [strongs id="h2183" /], and families [strongs id="h4940" /] through her witchcrafts [strongs id="h3785" /].

Behold, I [am] against thee, saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /]; and I will discover [strongs id="h1540" tvm="8765" /] thy skirts [strongs id="h7757" /] upon thy face [strongs id="h6440" /], and I will shew [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8689" /] the nations [strongs id="h1471" /] thy nakedness [strongs id="h4626" /], and the kingdoms [strongs id="h4467" /] thy shame [strongs id="h7036" /].

And I will cast [strongs id="h7993" tvm="8689" /] abominable filth [strongs id="h8251" /] upon thee, and make thee vile [strongs id="h5034" tvm="8765" /], and will set [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8804" /] thee as a gazingstock [strongs id="h7210" /].

And it shall come to pass, [that] all they that look [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8802" /] upon thee shall flee [strongs id="h5074" tvm="8799" /] from thee, and say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /], Nineveh [strongs id="h5210" /] is laid waste [strongs id="h7703" tvm="8795" /]: who will bemoan [strongs id="h5110" tvm="8799" /] her? whence [strongs id="h370" /] shall I seek [strongs id="h1245" tvm="8762" /] comforters [strongs id="h5162" tvm="8764" /] for thee?

Art thou better [strongs id="h3190" tvm="8686" /] than populous [strongs id="h527" tvm="8675" /] [strongs id="h528" /] No [strongs id="h4996" /], that was situate [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] among the rivers [strongs id="h2975" /], [that had] the waters [strongs id="h4325" /] round about [strongs id="h5439" /] it, whose rampart [strongs id="h2426" /] [was] the sea [strongs id="h3220" /], [and] her wall [strongs id="h2346" /] [was] from the sea [strongs id="h3220" /]?

Ethiopia [strongs id="h3568" /] and Egypt [strongs id="h4714" /] [were] her strength [strongs id="h6109" /], and [it was] infinite [strongs id="h369" /] [strongs id="h7097" /]; Put [strongs id="h6316" /] and Lubim [strongs id="h3864" /] were thy helpers [strongs id="h5833" /].

Yet [was] she carried away [strongs id="h1473" /], she went [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /] into captivity [strongs id="h7628" /]: her young children [strongs id="h5768" /] also were dashed in pieces [strongs id="h7376" tvm="8792" /] at the top [strongs id="h7218" /] of all the streets [strongs id="h2351" /]: and they cast [strongs id="h3032" tvm="8804" /] lots [strongs id="h1486" /] for her honourable men [strongs id="h3513" tvm="8737" /], and all her great men [strongs id="h1419" /] were bound [strongs id="h7576" tvm="8795" /] in chains [strongs id="h2131" /].

Thou also shalt be drunken [strongs id="h7937" tvm="8799" /]: thou shalt be hid [strongs id="h5956" tvm="8737" /], thou also shalt seek [strongs id="h1245" tvm="8762" /] strength [strongs id="h4581" /] because of the enemy [strongs id="h341" tvm="8802" /].

All thy strong holds [strongs id="h4013" /] [shall be like] fig trees [strongs id="h8384" /] with the firstripe figs [strongs id="h1061" /]: if they be shaken [strongs id="h5128" tvm="8735" /], they shall even fall [strongs id="h5307" tvm="8804" /] into the mouth [strongs id="h6310" /] of the eater [strongs id="h398" tvm="8802" /].

Behold, thy people [strongs id="h5971" /] in the midst [strongs id="h7130" /] of thee [are] women [strongs id="h802" /]: the gates [strongs id="h8179" /] of thy land [strongs id="h776" /] shall be set wide [strongs id="h6605" tvm="8800" /] open [strongs id="h6605" tvm="8738" /] unto thine enemies [strongs id="h341" tvm="8802" /]: the fire [strongs id="h784" /] shall devour [strongs id="h398" tvm="8804" /] thy bars [strongs id="h1280" /].

Draw [strongs id="h7579" tvm="8798" /] thee waters [strongs id="h4325" /] for the siege [strongs id="h4692" /], fortify [strongs id="h2388" tvm="8761" /] thy strong holds [strongs id="h4013" /]: go [strongs id="h935" tvm="8798" /] into clay [strongs id="h2916" /], and tread [strongs id="h7429" tvm="8798" /] the morter [strongs id="h2563" /], make strong [strongs id="h2388" tvm="8685" /] the brickkiln [strongs id="h4404" /].

There shall the fire [strongs id="h784" /] devour [strongs id="h398" tvm="8799" /] thee; the sword [strongs id="h2719" /] shall cut thee off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8686" /], it shall eat thee up [strongs id="h398" tvm="8799" /] like the cankerworm [strongs id="h3218" /]: make thyself many [strongs id="h3513" tvm="8690" /] as the cankerworm [strongs id="h3218" /], make thyself many [strongs id="h3513" tvm="8690" /] as the locusts [strongs id="h697" /].

Thou hast multiplied [strongs id="h7235" tvm="8689" /] thy merchants [strongs id="h7402" tvm="8802" /] above the stars [strongs id="h3556" /] of heaven [strongs id="h8064" /]: the cankerworm [strongs id="h3218" /] spoileth [strongs id="h6584" tvm="8804" /], and flieth away [strongs id="h5774" tvm="8799" /].

Thy crowned [strongs id="h4502" /] [are] as the locusts [strongs id="h697" /], and thy captains [strongs id="h2951" /] as the great grasshoppers [strongs id="h1462" /], which camp [strongs id="h2583" tvm="8802" /] in the hedges [strongs id="h1448" /] in the cold [strongs id="h7135" /] day [strongs id="h3117" /], [but] when the sun [strongs id="h8121" /] ariseth [strongs id="h2224" tvm="8804" /] they flee away [strongs id="h5074" tvm="8776" /], and their place [strongs id="h4725" /] is not known [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8738" /] where [strongs id="h335" /] they [are].

Thy shepherds [strongs id="h7462" tvm="8802" /] slumber [strongs id="h5123" tvm="8804" /], O king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Assyria [strongs id="h804" /]: thy nobles [strongs id="h117" /] shall dwell [strongs id="h7931" tvm="8799" /] [in the dust]: thy people [strongs id="h5971" /] is scattered [strongs id="h6335" tvm="8738" /] upon the mountains [strongs id="h2022" /], and no man gathereth [strongs id="h6908" tvm="8764" /] [them].

[There is] no healing [strongs id="h3545" /] of thy bruise [strongs id="h7667" /]; thy wound [strongs id="h4347" /] is grievous [strongs id="h2470" tvm="8737" /]: all that hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8802" /] the bruit [strongs id="h8088" /] of thee shall clap [strongs id="h8628" tvm="8804" /] the hands [strongs id="h3709" /] over thee: for upon whom hath not thy wickedness [strongs id="h7451" /] passed [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8804" /] continually [strongs id="h8548" /]?
